model.name: removeHeaders
model.title: Remove Headers
model.description: Removes message headers whose name matches a specified pattern
model.label: eip,transformation

pattern.description: Name or pattern of headers to remove. The pattern is matched in the following order: 1 = exact match 2 = wildcard (pattern ends with a and the name starts with the pattern) 3 = regular expression (all of above is case in-sensitive).

excludePattern.description: Name or patter of headers to not remove. The pattern is matched in the following order: 1 = exact match 2 = wildcard (pattern ends with a and the name starts with the pattern) 3 = regular expression (all of above is case in-sensitive).

id.description: Sets the id of this node

description.description: Sets the description of this node
